subtitleNullable: Here are the cropped images of Avengers Characters used for ML Face Recognition.
descriptionNullable:
![](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Masterx-AI/Project_Face_Recognition/main/download.png)

### Description:

A facial recognition system is a technology capable of matching a human face from a digital image or a video frame against a database of faces, typically employed to authenticate users through ID verification services, works by pinpointing and measuring facial features from a given image.

The dataset contains three sub-directories for training, testing & validation. These directories 250, 60 & 60 samples each.

### Acknowledgement: 
The dataset is referred from Kaggle:
https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/yasserh/avengers-faces-dataset
The supporting resource file is provided in the OpenCV Repository:
https://github.com/opencv/opencv/blob/4.x/data/haarcascades/haarcascade_frontalface_default.xml

### Objective:
- To accurately perform face recognition using claissical Computer Vision + Deep Learning technique.
